value:
$WmMPID_総選挙マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_ELECTION01,Face|Anri won his battle all alone. I, on the
other hand, rely on the strength of
my friends.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Niðavellir's troops are withdrawing...
Did something happen?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Whew... They are incredibly strong.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|We made it through thanks in part
to your help. For that, I thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|He's gone? No! I still have
so many questions!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's no use, Princess Reginn!
We can't follow them.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|B-Broth...er...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princes Reginn? ...Are you all right?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's burning up. The shock of
what's happened must be setting in.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is there a place we can take
her where she can rest,
Princess Veronica?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You may bring her along...
Just this once. As a token
of my appreciation.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Thank you, Princess Veronica.
Fall back, everyone! We need
only hold out a little longer!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother! Wait!$k$pFáfnir!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Show yourself, Eitri! I'll level this
whole "sanctum" of yours with you
in it if I have to!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Ah, King Fáfnir. What lovely timing.
I have some matters I'd like to
address with you as well.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Your affairs don't matter to me.
Tell me what you know!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|"What I know"? You'll have to be
more specific...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Don't play the fool! The false divine
weapon you made! The imitation
summoning tool! Who used it?!$k$p$EFace_Pain|He...he summoned me here,
to this world, didn't he?!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Brother! Wh-what are you sayi—
Where is this coming from?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'll admit I'm surprised you were
able to get that far by yourself.
Rather impressive, actually.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Eitri, if you—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Of those summoned here before
you, you have been the only one to
maintain any semblance of sanity.$k$pAgain, truly impressive. I would go
so far as to say praiseworthy, even.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Alas, you did lose your memories,
so, ultimately...just another in a string
of failures.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I won't be your puppet any longer!
I will strangle you with whatever
strings you've bound me with!$k$pWhere did I come from?! Answer me!$k$pSend me back... Send me back
where I belong...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother, no! Don't say that!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I understand now...what I've been
searching for all this time.$k$pIt was on the other side of that
summoning gate in Askr... That's
why I—$k$pI only wanted to go back...all this
time... All this time! I wanted to
go home!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Oh, do you really mean that? You're
likely to hurt Ótr's feelings. He's your
brother, after all...$k$pAnd after he's made so many
sacrifices to keep you here!$k$pHe even helped create a weapon
to destroy gates all to make sure
you can never return.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...What?! Ótr, you—$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Pain|Ngyahh!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You can't leave, Brother. Without
you, what am I? What will I become?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What is... Is that Gramr?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It had to end at some point, Fáfnir...
Perhaps the time has come.$k$p$EFace|Oh! And I will answer your question
before I erase you. The answer is
something you will find...compelling.$k$pThat man, the one who summoned
you.... It was me.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|What?! How do... Explain yourself!
Who are you?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile2|Someone who loves Niðavellir.
More than you can imagine.$k$pThe zeal that beat in the heart of
the realm died with the royal
bloodline... And yet...$k$pIt seems our god has not yet
abandoned us.$k$p$EFace_Cool|*sigh* Now, Fáfnir...you will become
an offering on the altar of Niðavellir's
next king.$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Gyaaahhh! The crown... What is it
about this crown?! What dvergr
curse is—$k$pNo! Stop! I...don't want to fight
anymore! I don't want to kill!$k$pHrrgg... Nyaargghhh!
Uwaaghh!$k$p$Sbs150|
